saveplanetearth:

Ocean Life Faces Mass Extinction, Broad Study Says @ New York Times

Ocean life could be on brink of mass extinction, say scientists @ The Independent

Study: Ocean life faces mass extinction: Human-caused loss of marine life, so far confined to low rates, could soon overwhelm the seas @ Al Jazeera
